page.title: 12View of Poulton by Lynsey
page.content: Poulton is quite a large area, consisting of thousands of houses, many shops and some schools.Every morning, we can see how busy the roads are with people commutig to work and children going to school.We can see shopkeepers preparing to open the stores for business. Poulton also has access to the docks, where we can see the ships unloading their cargoes.Poulton is covered by{ {Police,Fire and Ambulance}services, which do a fine job. We have a{Library which is used by adults and children. I have lived in{Poulton}for 7 years and like it very much. Everybody is so friendly and helpful.The people of Poulton also keep beautiful gardens which look lovely in full bloom with sweet smeeling flowers and the park with freshly cut grass, and the trees in full leaf in summer.
